import React from 'react'; import LoadingSpinner from '../../components/LoadingSpinner'; const JoinModal = ({ isOpen, onClose, product, quantity, setQuantity, isJoining, onSubmit }) => { if (!isOpen) return null; const totalPrice = product ? product.price * quantity : 0; return (
{/* Background overlay */}
{/* Modal panel */}

Join Group for {product?.name}

setQuantity(Math.max(1, parseInt(e.target.value) || 1))} disabled={isJoining} />
Price per {product?.unit}: ₹{product?.price.toFixed(2)}
Quantity: {quantity} {product?.unit}
Total: ₹{totalPrice.toFixed(2)}

Groups lock automatically every Saturday if:

  • Total value is ₹1,000 or more
  • Group has 10 or more members
); }; export default JoinModal;
